I’am personally create more over 200 books, magazines and hundreds of advertise banner, brochures, visit cards I can and will deliver great results with a process that’s timely, collaborative and at a great value for  my clients. With the 3 year of experience in ebook conversion i have converted a lot of books various formats: mobi, epub, pdf, doc, indesign for all major platforms - amazon kindle, nook, itunes, createspace, lulu, bookbaby, google books, smashwords premium catalog and many more. 

I provide formatting/conversion service for authors/clients, which includes:

1. ePub3/ePub Conversion

6. Mobi Kindle Conversion

I’ll be pleased to cooperate with you in your project.
Thank you for your kind interest.

bio:
If you can dream it, We can design it.

Savvy Graphics, Inc., is a full-service graphic design firm.

We specialize in bringing our client’s creative visions to life. Whether detailed illustrations, unique logos, intricate one-of-a-kind cover or event poster artwork, or social media banners and posts, we design to inspire and bring out what makes our clients’ businesses unique.

Our custom logos are specific to each client’s vision. We take that vision and build creative brand solutions that support and empower your company identity.

Our clients benefit from the bonus of printing, direct marketing, and digital and social media marketing solutions, with results at competitive prices. Need a new website or a revamp? We create WordPress, Ecommerce, Wix, or the platform of your choice.

Consistently fast, reliable, easy to work with, and excellent at bringing creative ideas to life!

A deposit is required to begin work with the balance due upon final approval. A brief phone call sometimes helps to make sure we are both on the same page before the project begins followed up by email communication for specs, instructions, and content. I email proof and can text a copy as well if needed.

abstrac: Multi skilled, Data entry, Virtual assistant, Web search, Admin, Translation
bio:
About:
I'm a Senior Full-stack Web developer with over 10 years of commercial experience providing digital solutions for my clients with 100% satisfaction.

⮩ Web Development Skills:
✓ VueJs, Nuxt, ReactJS, Redux, Angular, React Native, Ionic, Chart.js, d3.js
✓ PHP, Symfony, Laravel, Cake, CodeIgniter
✓ Node.js, Express.js, Typescript, TypeORM
✓ RestAPI, GraphQL
✓ Javascript, jQuery, jQuery UI, jQuery Mobile
✓ HTML5/CSS3, SASS/LESS, Bootstrap 3 and 4
✓ Postgres, MySql, MongoDB
✓ APIs - Facebook, Twitter, Google API, Google Maps, Google Analytics, Dropbox, Twilio
✓ Asana, Jira, Trello
✓ Git, Bitbucket
✓ Photoshop and SEO

⮩ Web Development Categories
- Business and Not-for-profit
- Online store, eCommerce, Custom checkout development
- Membership-based website or App
- Real Estate IDX and MLS integration
- Scheduling and Booking
- Dashboard and Reporting
- Social Networking
- Video Streaming and Conferencing
- Blog and Online Courses
- Landing Page Design
- PSD or InDesign to HTML
- API integration
- LearnDash to SCORM and xAPI Conversation
- NFT/Crypto

⮩ Reasons to hire me
✓ I have over 8 years of commercial experience - I accomplished over 30 jobs of small or large one so far.
✓ I'm always learning and following the latest development standards. I provide high-quality and well-tested products.
✓ I provide realistic deadlines that I always met.
✓ I work on both Mac, Linux and Windows. I also try my work on iPhone and Android phones. This way, you can be sure that your website or app shall display appropriately on any device.
✓ I'm flexible with my working hours because I'm a full-time freelancer.
✓ I'm available daily. You will know the current status of the job because I contact you with updates frequently.
✓ I believe good communication is the key to a successful project. That's why I always respond promptly. 

I am looking for a remote job now and if you are interested please contact me.
I speak English and French and prefer French website development.
Thanks.

Available to work +40 hours a week, even on week ends.
My hours of operation are flexible,
